title: If a person just wiped the back of the hands & face, is the Tayammum valid?
transcript: Su from the ukam so if a person um in in ton um if a person wipes the back of their hands and the face but just the back of the hands because they are ignorant that the pums um are not supposed to be wiped is a valid a person has to wipe his face and His Hands just wiping the Palms is not sufficient if someone does this wipes his face and wipes his hand like this this is not valid he has to wipe the entire hand the front and the back and Allah Knows Best
